title: Square Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Trendy cafe offering breakfast and brunch. Vegan options include tofu scramble, fruit bowl, toast, home fries, sauteed fingerlings, french fries, soy sausage, chips & salsa, vegetable wrap (vegans to omit feta), in-house-made veggie burger, soy milk. Often has weekly vegetarian/vegan special such as a veg sloppy joe with seitan/TVP. Vegetarian items are marked with a little green leaf and can be veganized. Local artwork for sale is displayed. Expect a long wait on weekends.
